## convertTimeToNanos() function

convertTimeToNanos converts Point's timestamp to a string.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function convertTimeToNanos(value: string | number | Date | undefined): string | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | string \| number \| Date \| undefined | supported timestamp value |

<b>Returns:</b>

string \| undefined

line protocol value
